reviewText: Great movie and great classic for kids to watch.
Love these classic cartoons. I wish they would come out with another superman series.

I bought this DVD as a stocking stuffer for my 3 year old son. He liked Superman as a toy or figurine, but had never watched the cartoon. He loves it!  There are multiple episodes on the DVD. Well worth the couple of bucks spent.
These are some of the first cartoons I remember.  They must have originally played in theatres because they came before television.  Surprisingly good animation.
